DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare safety effectiveness two version Bausch & Lomb Zyoptix Tissue Saving Aspheric Algorithm versus current Zyoptix Tissue Saving Algorithm use myopia myopic astigmatism LASIK treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Safety Effectiveness Aspheric Laser Refractive Surgery Treatments Myopia
DOC.criteria: Myopia without astigmatism . Normal Corneal topography Willing eye treat laser . Contraindications LASIK .
